channel.title: Run.bat (Need Basic Code)
channel.description:
Hi.
Could anyone please copy and paste a basic RunServer.bat code here? I have 2 compilers and no Run.bat, and I have no idea how to write my own at the moment.
Thank you.

item.title: Run.bat (Need Basic Code)
item.dc:creator: @Pkgem Pkgem
item.description:
@Pkgem wrote:

[quote=“puresdeath, post:3, topic:140864”]go to this website http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/549282 in second comment it explains the entire process of making a server… hope i helped!

^^^ thats for reference if u ever want to see it again this is the code for it though

delete everything in it and put

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/quote]
Thanks pures, it worked.

st 3r oi ds:

ill give u a run.bat if u explain how to get jdk 5.0 or 6.0 to work in my compiler =)

st 3r oi ds, delete everything in your compiler and put in this:

@echo off
color 0c
title Compiler
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_02/bin/javac.exe" *.java
pause

Make sure you’ve got the latest JDK download though.

Read full topic
